participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, I enjoy exploring new ideas and places.
participant_1.background: I am the youngest sibling of four. I am learning how to play the piano. I am a school psychologist. Chocolate is my favorite food. I geocache in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and thoughtful, I love sharing my love for literature with others.
participant_2.background: I love my girlfriend. I live in the city. I work in a bookstore. I have an older brother.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do in the city?
I love going to bookstores and just getting lost in the books.
That sounds fun! I love bookstores too.
I'm so glad! I'm a librarian, so I'm always around books.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a librarian.
It's a great job! I love helping people find books they'll enjoy.
I can imagine. What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorite books.
Me too. I love reading. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction.
I like historical fiction too! What's your favorite historical fiction book?
My favorite historical fiction book is "The Help" by Kathryn Stockett.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books.
Me too. I love talking about books.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go geocaching.
What's geocaching?
It's a global treasure hunt. People hide containers called "geocaches" all over the world, and then other people use GPS devices to find them.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It is! I've been geocaching for a few years, and I've found a lot of cool places.
That's awesome! I've never heard of geocaching before, but it sounds like something I would enjoy.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun
